author: siren
msg: reduce the size of .job from 19+M down to 14+M

author: ate
msg: Dojo widget templates need special care for adding license headers
Just adding the license headers as a (xml) comment, breaks the widget definition as dojo doesn't properly find the right content anymore.
Wrap the intended widget content in a <body></body> tag.
Dojo checks for a <body> tag and when found uses only the <body> tag content.

author: ate
msg: - results of running insert_license.pl but which needed a lot corrections by hand and thus also manually review of each and every change :(
- a few changes were particular tricky to get "right" so I've isolated those out and will commit them separately
